sentences: Hannah M. Jones is an artist and musician from Athens, Georgia.
Born in Par, England, Hannah grew up in Sandersville, Georgia, and later attended art school at the University of Georgia in Athens, Georgia.

Past member of Elephant Six Collective band The Circulatory System, as well as The Instruments, she now focuses her attention on her songwriting project The New Sound of Numbers  (called Sound Houses briefly) as a vocalist/12-string guitarist/drummer, and is drummer/vocalist for Supercluster (band)
